environment_variables.SPACK_DEPENDENCIES: ^cuda@11.2.2/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' cuda@11.2.2 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^py-numpy@1.20.3/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' py-numpy@1.20.3 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^openblas@0.3.17/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' openblas@0.3.17 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~ilp64 threads=none) ^fftw@3.3.10/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' fftw@3.3.10 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~mpi ~openmp)
environment_variables.SPACK_SPEC: openmm@7.5.0 % gcc@8.5.0 +cuda cuda_arch=60,75,80,86 ~ipo ^cuda@11.2.2/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' cuda@11.2.2 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^py-numpy@1.20.3/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' py-numpy@1.20.3 % ${SPACK_COMPILER}) ^openblas@0.3.17/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' openblas@0.3.17 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~ilp64 threads=none) ^fftw@3.3.10/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' fftw@3.3.10 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~mpi ~openmp)
